name: After Meeting
description:
Hello,
Thank you for playing this game!
This is our first game. I hope you can give more suggestions and comments. We can consider more in the next game. Thank you！
Thank you for playing this game.
This is a casual love decryption game. the gameplay is simple. Every level in the game is regular, you need to find the regularity and complete the game. In the process of passing the game, you can discover the story.
Thank you again for playing this game!
